attributes.action: Get Glastonbury Festival to screen the 2nd Lions Test
attributes.additional_details:
3 years ago they showed the irrelevant England pool match in the 2010 football World Cup. Why on earth would they not want to screen a proper sport, fiercely contested between some of the greatest rugby players in the world.
We don't have much time, if you're going please sign. If you're not going, please sign. If you realise that Lions test rugby is far greater than England football, THEN SIGN!!!!
